00011 Lexicon::Lexicon()
00012 {
00013         i = 0; // number of inserted words
00014         vector<string> int2strAssignment(VECTOR_INIT_SIZE, "");
00015         insertWord("(?)");
00016 }

00018 unsigned int Lexicon::insertWord(string word)
00019 {
00020         // insert word in str2intAssignment
00021         pair<map<string,unsigned int>::iterator, bool> temp = str2intAssignment.insert(pair<string,unsigned int> (word,i)); //returns an iterator and a bool which is false if the same word has alredy been inserted
00022         
00023         if(temp.second) // is the word new to the assignment
00024         {
00025                 // word is new
00026                 if (i >= int2strAssignment.size()) // resize vector if necessary
00027                         {
00028                                 int2strAssignment.resize(int2strAssignment.size() + VECTOR_RESIZE);
00029                         }
00030                 // insert word in int2strAssignment
00031                 int2strAssignment[i] = word;
00032                 i++;
00033                 return (i-1);
00034         }
00035         else
00036         {
00037                 // word is already inserted in both assignments
00038                 return (*temp.first).second;
00039         }
00040 }

00042 vector<unsigned int> Lexicon::insertSentence(vector<string> words, SingleCount* singlesObject)
00043 {
00044         vector<unsigned int> result(words.size(), 0);
00045         // put all words of the sentence in source language-lexicon and the value of the word into the lang-object
00046         unsigned int i;
00047         for (i=0; i < words.size(); i++)
00048         {
00049                 unsigned int val = this->insertWord(words[i]);
00050                 // nur zählen wenn auch ein SingleCount objekt übergeben wurde
00051                 if (singlesObject != NULL)
00052                         singlesObject->insert(val);
00053                 result[i] = val;
00054         }
00055         return result;
00056 }
00057 
00058 vector<unsigned int> Lexicon::insertSentence(string line, SingleCount* singlesObject)
00059 {
00060         vector<string> words = stringSplit(line, " ");
00061         return this->insertSentence(words, singlesObject);
00062 }

00064 string Lexicon::getWord(unsigned int value)
00065 {
00066         if (value >= int2strAssignment.size())
00067                 return "?";
00068         string re = int2strAssignment[value];
00069         return re;
00070 }
00071 
00072 unsigned int Lexicon::getNum(string word)
00073 {
00074         return (str2intAssignment.find(word))->second;
00075 }
